scripts.test:input-json: pnpm --filter @ecoindex-lh-test/cli run npx collect --json-file ./input-file.json && pnpm verify:file
scripts.test:url: pnpm --filter @ecoindex-lh-test/cli run npx collect -u http://localhost:3000/simple -u http://localhost:3000/svg -u http://localhost:3000/shadow-dom -u http://localhost:3000/svg-shadow-dom -u http://localhost:3000/complex --puppeteer-script ./puppeteer-script.mjs --extra-header ./extra-header.json && pnpm verify:url
scripts.lint: echo "No lint because this is a test app"
scripts.lint:fix: echo "No lint because this is a test app"
scripts.typecheck: echo "No typecheck because this is a test app"
scripts.format:write: echo "No format:write because this is a test app"
scripts.format:check: echo "No format:check because this is a test app"
